summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta, AWS) are all significantly increasing AI infrastructure investments, with combined 2024/2025 Capex guidance exceeding $180B. Current H100/A100 rental prices remain high at $3.12/hr, indicating sustained demand exceeding supply. Concurrently, GPT-5 is in advanced testing and Gemini 2 has been released, driving further demand.
